sentence: Mr. CLEAVER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today with a deep sense of gratitude  for the opportunity to recognize a great Missourian, Mr. Gerard Joseph  Grimaldi, for his exemplary personal and professional accomplishments  as he begins his next chapter of life, enjoying retirement. An  experienced leader, dedicated…
